    • load

      public boolean load​(java.lang.String fileDir, DeckModel whiteDeck, DeckModel blackDeck)
      Loads the given or default text file to their respective white or black card decks.
      Parameters:
      fileDir - the file/deck to be used
      whiteDeck - the whitedeck that will be filled with card from file
      blackDeck - the blackdeck that will be filled with card from file
      Returns:
      true if fileDir completely loaded

    • dealCards

      public boolean dealCards()
      Gives players cards from the white deck until white deck is empty
      Returns:
      false if white deck still has available cards
